title: Tomorrow's Gifts
description: The ghost of Christmas Future...Michael loves his burly, powerful partner Neil, but he's too embarrassed to share his secret fantasies of submission and surrender. Frustrated and confused, he wonders whether he and Neil really belong together.Then, on Christmas Eve, Michael receives a visit from a sexy Dom, Thorne Wilder, who claims to be his lover from the future. Thorne shows Michael scenes from a wild life of sexual excess that he claims they'll share if he breaks up with Neil.Should Michael trust the ghost of Christmas future, or does his true future lie with Neil?
author: Lisabet Sarai
